CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity: Public API for Defender for Identity settings through MS Graph
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Defender for Identity will expose data and actions for its settings through a set of programmatic APIs as part of Microsoft Graph. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity: Public API for Defender for Identity settings through MS Graph
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Defender for Identity will expose data and actions for its settings through a set of programmatic APIs as part of Microsoft Graph.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - In-app search relevance improvement to increase matching results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning in-app Search will be improved to show more relevant and matching results at the top. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - In-app search relevance improvement to increase matching results
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning in-app Search will be improved to show more relevant and matching results at the top.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Contextual evidence match for endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: With this update you will be able to see the matched sensitive information type and the context surrounding it (300 characters) as a result of a DLP policy match on your endpoint devices. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Contextual evidence match for endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description: With this update you will be able to see the matched sensitive information type and the context surrounding it (300 characters) as a result of a DLP policy match on your endpoint devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Work hour access controls for Front Line Workers
CurrentVersion.description: Allows IT admins to establish no Teams notifications or access when workers clock out of work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Work hour access controls for Front Line Workers
OldVersion.description: Allows IT admins to establish no Teams notifications or access when workers clock out of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video reactions
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to add or remove reactions to specific points of a recorded video via Stream Web App and Embed. Viewers will be able to see how their colleagues feel about a video and show their support towards the video owner. These reactions will be present in the timeline to highlight the most important parts of the video and can be used for navigation. Also, owners of the video can see detailed analytics about when viewers are reacting to videos and have ability to disable the feature.  This feature was incorrectly updated to a status of rolling out upon preview availability.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: video reactions
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to add or remove reactions to specific points of a recorded video via Stream Web App and Embed. Viewers will be able to see how their colleagues feel about a video and show their support towards the video owner. These reactions will be present in the timeline to highlight the most important parts of the video and can be used for navigation. Also, owners of the video can see detailed analytics about when viewers are reacting to videos and have ability to disable the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to Viva App Bar
CurrentVersion.description:
Viva Glint displays Viva App Bar for improved discoverability of other Viva Apps.

This feature has been removed from the roadmap to create a more consistent user experience for all Viva Glint users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to Viva App Bar
OldVersion.description: Viva Glint displays Viva App Bar for improved discoverability of other Viva Apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
CurrentVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
OldVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
CurrentVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
OldVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Simplified App Control policy creation experience (curated workflow)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure an App Control policy with built-in toggles in the console that expose all App Control for Business capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Simplified App Control policy creation experience (curated workflow)
OldVersion.description: Configure an App Control policy with built-in toggles in the console that expose all App Control for Business capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: New design for Windows Company Portal app
CurrentVersion.description: With the updated design, users will see improvements in user experience for the Home, Devices, and Downloads & updates pages. The new design is more intuitive and highlights areas where users need to take action.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: New design for Windows Company Portal app
OldVersion.description: With the updated design, users will see improvements in user experience for the Home, Devices, and Downloads & updates pages. The new design is more intuitive and highlights areas where users need to take action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Digital signage on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users can view dynamic, engaging, and relevant content on the Teams Rooms front-of-room display when the device is not in use. Admins can remotely configure tenant-wide and room-specific digital signage settings at scale from Teams Rooms Pro Management. Integrations with selected third-party digital signage providers and content management systems are supported, initial partners are Appspace and XOGO. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro license customers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Digital signage on Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: Users can view dynamic, engaging, and relevant content on the Teams Rooms front-of-room display when the device is not in use. Admins can remotely configure tenant-wide and room-specific digital signage settings at scale from Teams Rooms Pro Management. Integrations with selected third-party digital signage providers and content management systems are supported, initial partners are Appspace and XOGO. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro license customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
CurrentVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
OldVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
OldVersion.description: Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
OldVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Participant roster grouping in Teams BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When participants join a Teams meeting with their laptop in bring your own device (BYOD) meeting rooms, they will appear in the ‘in-room’ participant section of the roster enabling individual identification and meeting intelligence capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Participant roster grouping in Teams BYOD meeting rooms
OldVersion.description: When participants join a Teams meeting with their laptop in bring your own device (BYOD) meeting rooms, they will appear in the ‘in-room’ participant section of the roster enabling individual identification and meeting intelligence capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Microsoft Teams chat and channels experience
CurrentVersion.description: The new, streamlined chat and channels experience makes it easier to stay on top of what matters most and organize your digital workspace. Catch up on chat, channels and teams in one place, create custom sections to organize conversations by topics, use filters to triage messages and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: MySites card for Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This card will help operators add a card on the Viva Connections Dashboard which will provide quick access to the frequently accessed and followed sites by the end user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Require Existing Microsoft 365 Group for New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Ensure new Loop workspaces are connected to and managed by an existing Microsoft 365 Group, similar to SharePoint Team sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Microsoft 365 Groups for Managing New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new Loop workspace, users can specify an existing Microsoft 365 Group to manage the workspace's lifetime, governance, and compliance, similar to SharePoint Team sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location. A feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant will now be available for customers in GCC. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (customer managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: In the alerts triage and incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Enable OCSI for Tenants
CurrentVersion.description: If a tenant has the (EnableAllOcsiClients) GPO enabled, Office and OneDrive are able to communicate smoothly. Right now, tenants have the option to disable the GPO, and when they disable the GPO, it becomes difficult to ensure that all internal versions of Office files are kept up to date so that features like autosave, version history, real time user collab, and merging in the case of conflicts can work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity: Public API for Defender for Identity settings through MS Graph
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Defender for Identity will expose data and actions for its settings through a set of programmatic APIs as part of Microsoft Graph. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.
